content.text: Hey, I'm [user 1 name]. What's your name?
Hey, I'm [user 2 name].  I'm a music teacher.
That's awesome! I teach music too. What do you like about it?
I love getting to share my love of music with others. It's so rewarding to see someone get excited about learning a new instrument or song.
I know what you mean. I love seeing the look on a student's face when they finally master a piece of music. It's like all their hard work has paid off.
Exactly! That's why I love teaching.
What instruments do you teach?
I teach piano, guitar, and ukulele.
Wow, that's a lot!
Yeah, but I love it. It's so much fun to teach different instruments.
I bet. Do you have a favorite instrument to teach?
It's hard to say. I love them all for different reasons.
What are your favorite types of music to play?
I love playing all types of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
That's cool. I love country music too.
Me too! Do you have a favorite country artist?
I love Alan Jackson. He's my favorite country artist.
I love Alan Jackson too! He's so good.
Yeah, he is. He's one of my favorite musicians of all time.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too!
